Title: Set up project charter
Body: Define scope, goals, and success metrics for the project.

Title: Create architecture overview
Body: Document system architecture and key dependencies.

Title: Define API contract
Body: Draft and review API endpoints, payloads, and error handling.

Title: Add user profile page
Body: Create profile UI and data update workflow.

Title: Implement notifications
Body: Add in-app and email notification support.

Title: Create dashboard metrics
Body: Build dashboard cards and trend charts for key KPIs.

Title: Add audit logging
Body: Track sensitive user actions for compliance.

Title: Write test plan
Body: Document unit, integration, and E2E testing strategy.

Title: Run accessibility pass
Body: Audit key screens for accessibility and fix blocking issues.

Title: Prepare release checklist
Body: Create release readiness criteria and rollback plan.

Title: Post-release monitoring
Body: Define alerts and monitor key production metrics.
